resources.string: You haven’t added any tags yet
Kārḍa līka asē cinhāṅkita kēlē āhē āṇi nilambita kēlē āhē
हे वेब व्ह्यूमध्ये अंतर्गत त्रुटीमुळे होते
वेबव्ह्यू सिस्टमद्वारे संपुष्टात आले. जेव्हा अनुप्रयोग मोठ्या प्रमाणात फॉन्ट किंवा मीडियामुळे मेमरी संपत नाही तेव्हा असे होते.
गंभीर त्रुटी: वेबव्यू प्रस्तुतकर्ता क्रॅश झाला. कारणः%s
सिस्टम \'वेबव्यू\' \'%1$s\' कार्ड प्रस्तुत करण्यात अयशस्वी. \ N%2$s
आजची नवीन कार्ड मर्यादा सुधारित करा
आजची पुनरावलोकन कार्ड मर्यादा सुधारित करा
Vartamāna impuṭa banda karā āṇi haravū nakā?
कोणतीही कार्ड तयार केली नाही. कृपया अधिक फील्ड भरा
या टीप प्रकारात क्लोझ डिलीटन्स असणे आवश्यक आहे
वर्तमान नोट प्रकाराने कोणतीही कार्ड तयार केली नाही. आणखी एक \n कृपया दुसरा टीप प्रकार निवडा किंवा ‘कार्ड’ क्लिक करा आणि फील्ड प्रतिस्थापना जोडा
क्लोझ हटविणे केवळ क्लोज नोट प्रकारावरच कार्य करेल
Kāhīhī na kēlēlyā kōṇatyāhī kārḍānnā haṭavilē jā\'īla. Ṭīpakaḍē urvarita kārḍa nasalyāsa tō gamāvalā jā\'īla. Āpalyālā khātrī āhē kī āpaṇa surū ṭhēvū icchitā?

string.comment: Title of error dialog

resources.string:
There is not enough space to import the package.
Needed - %1$s 
Available - %2$s.

Having Trouble? Try to free space on your phone if possible. Alternatively, sync uses less space than import. You may try importing the package with a device with more space (for example Anki Desktop) and then sync it to this device.
फाइल आयात करताना त्रुटी, प्रक्रियेदरम्यान कदाचित कॅशे साफ होईल. Lease n कृपया पुन्हा प्रयत्न करा
डेटा आयात यशस्वी झाले परंतु आयातानंतरची साफसफाई अयशस्वी झाली. नंतर चेक डेटाबेस चालवा. मूळ कारणे:%s
Apkg फाईल दूषित आहे. कृपया ते हटवा आणि पुन्हा डाउनलोड करा. \n\n मूळ कारण:%s
अंकी डेटाबेस (.anki2) बदली अद्याप समर्थित नाहीत. कृपया बदलीच्या सूचनांसाठी मॅन्युअल पहा.
Nivaḍalēlī phā\'ila AnkiDroid dvārē svayan̄calitapaṇē āyāta karaṇē śakya navhatē. Kr̥payā ēnkī phā\'ilsa svahastē kaśī āyāta karāvī yābaddala vāparakartā mĕn\'yu\'ala pahā: \n%s

Hi!

This is an Anki flashcards deck sent from AnkiDroid[1]. Try to open it using one of the available Anki distributions[2] and enjoy easy and efficient learning!

[1] %1$s
[2] %2$s

string.name: study_options
string.comment: Name for a preference category in Filtered deck (aka Cram deck, aka Custom study) options

string.name: menu__study_options
string.comment: Menu item that opens options for a Filtered deck (aka Cram deck, aka Custom study)

resources.string: This is a special deck for studying outside of the normal schedule. Cards will be automatically returned to their original decks after you review them. Deleting this deck from the deck list will return all remaining cards to their original deck.
Steps must be numbers greater than 0
At least one step is required
To see them now touch the “Unbury” item in the menu
Some related or buried cards were delayed until tomorrow
A filtered deck cannot have subdecks
Do not forget to study today!
This file requires a newer version of Anki.
The system does not have an app installed that can perform this action.
Camera images may be large. You may wish to compress & resize images in the media directory
No browser found，please visit web page by pc or mobile:
External page link in card is not supported.

resources.string: Something went wrong, please try again
You can use other apps while the download is running

AnkiDroid must move its data to meet new Android privacy rules 

If you uninstall AnkiDroid before the migration, your data will be lost 

Please perform the migration as soon as possible
Migration will occur in the background. You will be unable to sync while migrating\n\nEstimated duration: %s
I have backed up my data
I have synced with AnkiWeb recently
I will not uninstall the app while data is being moved
Please accept all items to continue
Sync is disabled until the migration is done.\n %1$d media files left to migrate.
If you reinstall AnkiDroid, it will not be able to open your collection.
If you uninstall AnkiDroid, you will need to download your full collection again.

Android storage access policy requires us to change where we store your collection. When your data is migrated AnkiDroid will be faster and your data will be more secure. You will not be able to sync during the storage migration.
Starting storage migration. You may resume using AnkiDroid shortly.
You may resume using AnkiDroid. \nStorage migration will continue in the background.
%s is not a valid javascript addon package
Malicious archive. Contains entry outside of the target dir: %s
Malicious archive. Size exceeds %1$s or contains more than %2$d files
Failed to access collection. Please try again!
Anki\'s card scheduler saves time by strengthening your weakest memories and preserving your strongest
